content.title: Object-Oriented Programming
content.statement: Object-Oriented Programming is a fundamental concept in Science Computer-Science that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Object-Oriented Programming helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Object-Oriented Programming include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Object-Oriented Programming.

definitions_glossary.concept: A fundamental idea or notion in the domain
definitions_glossary.property: A characteristic or attribute of an entity
definitions_glossary.relationship: A connection or association between concepts
